original_text: They remembered what Hammedatha's son, Haman, the descendant of Agag, had done. He had been the enemy of the Jews and he had tried to destroy them all. He had thrown dice, called Purim, to choose the day when he would attack them and kill them.
korean_text: 곧 아각 사람 함므다다의 아들 모든 유다인의 대적 하만이 유다인을 진멸하기를 꾀하고 부르 곧 제비를 뽑아 그들을 죽이고 멸하려 하였으나

sentences.original_text: They remembered what Hammedatha's son, Haman, had done
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 함메다다의 아들 하만이 한 일을 기억했다

sentences.original_text: He had been the enemy of the Jews
and he had tried to destroy them all
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그들을 모두 파멸시키려 했다

sentences.original_text: He had thrown dice, called Purim
to choose the day when he would attack them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그들을 공격할 날짜를 선택하기 위해
